English: Free China (Cold War era term for the Republic of China on Taiwan, as distinct from "Red China")

d.f: `國際人~`士~`稱~`在~`臺灣~`的~`自由~`民主~`的~`中華~`民國~`為~「`自由中國~」，`以~`別~`於~`盤踞~`大陸~`的~「`赤色中國~」。`近年~`我國~`人~`亦~`習~`於~`自稱~`為~「`自由中國~」。

English: Free China (Cold War era term for the Republic of China on Taiwan, as distinct from "Red China")
